channel.title: Comic-Con News
channel.description: Latest news from Comic-Con as it happens.

item.title: Everything Marvel and Disney Showed Off at Brazil's CCXP19
item.description: Cast and filmmakers from Lucasfilm, Marvel Studios, Twentieth Century Fox, Blue Sky Studios, Pixar & Walt Disney Animation Studios in attendance at this year's Brazil Comic Con.

item.title: Wonder Woman 1984 Postcard Teases Trailer Drop at CCXP This December
item.description: Warner Bros. will reveal the first trailer for Wonder Woman 1984 at CCXP in Brazil this December.

item.title: Every Movie Trailer from Comic-Con 2019
item.description: San Diego Comic-Con 2019 is over and there are a ton of awesome movie trailers to catch up on.

item.title: The Jangly Man Arrives in Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark Comic-Con Poster
item.description: The Jangly Man was featured heavily in the Comic-Con-exclusive footage of Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark over the weekend.

item.title: Takashi Miike's First Love Trailer Is a Toxic Cocktail of Call Girls, Boxers & Drugs
item.description: Takashi Miike returns with a new high-energy classic First Love, which will hit theaters in New York and Los Angeles this fall.

item.title: Marvel Has MCU Phase 5 Fully Planned, Almost Announced at Comic-Con
item.description: Kevin Feige and crew weren't sure how much they should divulge to the public over the weekend at San Diego Comic-Con.

item.title: Kevin Smith on Final Shot in Rise of Skywalker: It Will Melt Your Mind
item.description: Kevin Smith was one of the few lucky people on the planet to visit The Rise of Skywalker set and he is teasing something huge.

item.title: The Eternals Concept Art Reveals Marvel's Mighty Celestials
item.description: Marvel Studios boss Kevin Feige officially announced The Eternals and its cast at San Diego Comic-Con over the weekend.

item.title: Mahershala Ali's Blade Movie Is Part of Marvel Phase 5
item.description: After announcing Mahershala Ali as our next Blade, Kevin Feige has now put him in the timeline.

item.title: Choke Gasp! Book Will Celebrate the Best of 75 Years of EC Comics
item.description: A 528-page deluxe hardcover book, bold|Choke Gasp! will arrive just in time to celebrate EC Comics' 75th anniversary.

item.title: Watch Marvel's Comic-Con Panel Highlights with Those Explosive MCU Phase 4 Announcements
item.description: Marvel Studios boss Kevin Feige brought out the big guns last night in San Diego and fans are still losing their minds from all of the announcements.

item.title: Shudder's Daniel Isn't Real Trailer Brings Brain-Twisting Madness to Comic-Con
item.description: Adam Egypt Mortimer is behind the camera for Daniel Isn't Real, the upcoming horror thriller, which stars Patrick Schwarzenegger.

item.title: Natalie Portman Is Female Thor in Thor: Love and Thunder
item.description: Natalie Portman is coming back to the world of Thor and this time she is worthy to wield Mjolnir.

item.title: Why Avengers 5 Wasn't Announced at Comic-Con According to Kevin Feige
item.description: Kevin Feige says Phase of the Marvel Cinematic Universe is about beginnings, which is why Avengers 5 isn't happening yet.

item.title: The Simpsons Movie 2 Will Happen at Disney Says Creator Matt Groening
item.description: The Simpsons creator Matt Groening feels Disney will no doubt produce a sequel to The Simpsons Movie one of these days

item.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness Is the MCU's First Full-On Horror Movie
item.description: Director Scott Derrickson revealed Doctor Strange 2 will be scary, with gothic horror themes at SDCC.

item.title: Marvel Is Making Blade Because of Mahershala Ali Says Kevin Feige
item.description: Marvel Studios president Kevin Feige reveals how Moonlight and True Detective season 3 star Mahershala Ali snagged the role of Blade.

item.title: Valkyrie Will Be the MCU's First Openly LGBTQ Hero in Thor: Love and Thunder
item.description: Tessa Thompson and Marvel Studios boss Kevin Feige have revealed we will see more to the Valkyrie character in Thor: Love and Thunder.

item.title: Captain Marvel 2 Will Officially Be Part of Marvel Phase 4
item.description: Marvel Studios President Kevin Feige officially revealed that Captain Marvel 2 is in the works.

item.title: X-Men Confirmed for the MCU at San Diego Comic-Con
item.description: Marvel Studios President Kevin Feige revealed they're developing the X-Men within the MCU following the Fox merger.

item.title: Fantastic Four Reboot Confirmed for MCU Phase 4
item.description: Kevin Feige has confirmed the Fantastic Four will appear in the Marvel Cinematic Universe during the Marvel SDCC panel.

item.title: Black Widow Comes Spring 2020, Taskmaster, Budapest & Post-Civil War Plot Confirmed
item.description: Black Widow movie gets a May 1, 2020 release. Taskmaster is the villain, Budapest and post Captain America: Civil War Plot confirmed.

item.title: Thor: Love and Thunder Will Have Female Thor, Coming November 2021
item.description: Thor 4 finallgets a releasee date and a title... Thor: Love and Thunder is coming November 5, 2021.

item.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness Coming May 2021, Nightmare Is the Villain
item.description: Marvel Studios announced the Doctor Strange sequel, Doctor Strange In the Multiverse of Madness, coming in 2021.

item.title: Netflix's Army of the Dead Cast Photo Shared by Dave Bautista
item.description: Zack Snyder could not attend this year's San Diego Comic-Con since he is busy working on Army of the Dead.

item.title: Bob's Burgers Movie Is a Mystery-Musical, More Details Revealed at Comic-Con
item.description: Creator Loren Bouchard revealed new details about the Bob's Burgers movie, which arrives next summer.

item.title: Henry Cavill Was Asked If He's Still Superman and Things Got Awkward
item.description: During a recent interview about his new show The Witcher, Henry Cavill was forced to confront his future, or lack thereof, as Superman in the DCEU.

item.title: Justice League #SnyderCut Images Show Wonder Woman Killing Steppenwolf
item.description: Zack Snyder has released some more information on his cut of Justice League and admits he still hasn't seen the theatrical cut.

item.title: Superman: Red Son Animated Movie Announced at Comic-Con
item.description: DC announced their animated movie slate for 2020, which includes Superman: Red Son and Justice League Dark: Apokolips War.

item.title: 21 Bridges Comic-Con Trailer: Chadwick Boseman Stars in Russo Bros. Cop Killer Thriller
item.description: The Russo Brothers unveiled the latest 21 Bridges trailer at San Diego Comic-Con during their panel.

item.title: Zombie Tidal Wave Trailer: Ian Ziering Trades in Sharknado for Wet Zombies
item.description: The director and star of Sharknado are hoping Zombie Tidal Wave will launch a new Syfy franchise.

item.title: Battle of the Planets Movie Is Happening with Avengers: Endgame Directors
item.description: Joe and Anthony Russo announced their upcoming projects at SDCC, including a Battle of the Planets live-action adaptation.

item.title: First Zombieland 2 Poster Pulls the Double Tap at Comic-Con
item.description: Sony Pictures has released a brand new poster for Zombieland 2: Double Tap, which is set to arrive in theaters this fall.

item.title: Conan Enters The Spider-Verse in New Spider-Man Themed Comic-Con Intro
item.description: Conan O'Brien is down at SDCC 2019 and his show's themed intro took a little inspiration from Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse.

item.title: Gamora's True Fate Officially Revealed by Avengers: Endgame Writers
item.description: There have been a lot of questions in regard to whether or not Gamora survived Tony Stark's snap since Avengers: Endgame hit theaters.

item.title: Rise of Skywalker Prequel Comic Is Coming, Check Out the Amazing Cover Art
item.description: Star Wars fans are going to learn about the events that take place in between The Last Jedi and Rise of Skywalker.

item.title: #ReleaseTheSnyderCut Justice League Banners Fly High Over Comic-Con
item.description: Zack Snyder fans have delivered on their promise to fly a plane over Comic-Con demanding the Snyder Cut of Justice League.

item.title: Watch The Batman Director Get a Big Message from SDCC Crowd: Don't Screw It Up
item.description: Director Matt Reeves got a message from the SDCC crowd regarding his movie, The Batman, starring Robert Pattinson.

item.title: Heads Will Roll: Thanos Almost Chopped Captain America's Head Off in Avengers: Endgame
item.description: Christopher Markus and Stephen McFeely originally wanted a pretty gruesome scene including the Mad Titan and Captain America.

item.title: Watch Tom Cruise Crash Comic-Con with Surprise Tog Gun 2 Footage for Hall H Fans
item.description: Tom Cruise made a surprise appearance at San Diego Comic-Con to show off the first footage from next summer's Top Gun: Maverick.

item.title: How Jay & Silent Bob Reboot Successfully Reunited Ben Affleck & Kevin Smith
item.description: Ben Affleck and Kevin Smith had not spoken to each other in nearly a decade before reuniting for Jay & Silent Bob Reboot.

item.title: First Cats Poster Promises You Will Believe, But in What We're Not Sure
item.description: The trailer for Cats dropped earlier this week and many people are puzzled by what they are watching.

item.title: Halloween Kills & Halloween Ends: Michael Myers Saga Will End in Back-To-Back Sequels
item.description: Universal Pictures and Blumhouse have announced two more Halloween sequels to end the franchise coming in 2020 and 2021.

item.title: Les Grossman Remembered: Tom Cruise Revisits Tropic Thunder Character at Comic-Con
item.description: The Top Gun 2: Maverick trailer was the surprise hit of San Diego Comic-Con on Thursday and Tom Cruise kept the surprises coming.

item.title: SpongeBob Trips Out in It's a Wonderful Sponge Comic-Con Poster
item.description: Nickelodeon has debuted the first poster for The SpongeBob Movie: It's a Wonderful Sponge, which hits theaters next summer.

item.title: Carl Be Back: Terminator Dark Fate R-Rated Sneak Peek from Comic-Con Arrives
item.description: Paramount Pictures has released a peek behind-the-scenes at Terminator: Dark Fate, which also features some of the footage shown at Comic-Con today.

item.title: Goriest IT Chapter Two Scene Is Carrie on Steroids with 4,500 Gallons of Blood
item.description: Jessica Chastain pushed for more blood in IT: Chapter Two, which resulted in a record-setting amount.

item.title: Finn Wolfhard Throws FaceApp Shade at IT Chapter 2 Co-Star Bill Hader
item.description: FaceApp is all over social media right now as users share what they might look like when they get older.

item.title: Netflix Announces The Movies That Made Us Series from the Creators of The Toys That Made Us
item.description: Nostalgia will always be big, which is why Netflix has expanded their The Toys That Made Us docuseries into the movie side of things.

item.title: Top Gun 2 Has a Shirtless Sports Scene, Tom Cruise Wasn't Joking
item.description: Many thought Tom Cruise was either kidding or on autopilot when he said Top Gun 2: Maverick might feature another volleyball scene.

item.title: Cats Trailer Arrives, Taylor Swift and Idris Elba Are Fierce Felines
item.description: Universal Pictures has released the first trailer for Tom Hooper's Cats, featuring Taylor Swift and Idris Elba.

item.title: Maverick Prepares to Fly in First Top Gun 2 Poster
item.description: Paramount Pictures has revealed the official poster for Top Gun: Maverick featuring Tom Cuire, following the release of the teaser trailer.

item.title: New Terminator: Dark Fate Footage Smashes Comic-Con with Surprising New Reveals
item.description: Lucky attendees at San Diego Comic-Con were treated to a surprise visit from Arnold Schwarzenegger and new Terminator: Dark Fate footage.

item.title: You'll Never Guess What They Named Schwarzenegger's T-800 in Terminator: Dark Fate
item.description: Arnold Schwarzenegger's T-800 in Terminator: Dark Fate has an actual, human name, and it's surprising.

item.title: Fat Thor Gets His Own Avengers: Endgame Action Figure at Comic-Con
item.description: Chris Hemsworth's Avengers: Endgame version of Thor was a fan-favorite moment and now they can own the action figure.

item.title: Top Gun 2: Maverick Trailer Is Here as Tom Cruise Lands at Comic-Con
item.description: Those in attendance at this year's SDCC were treated to a special presentation of the Top Gun sequel.

item.title: Edward Furlong Will Return as John Connor in Terminator: Dark Fate
item.description: Terminator: Dark Fate producer James Cameron appeared at San Diego Comic-Con via satellite to reveal the return of Edward Furlong.

item.title: Val Kilmer Is Bluntman in Jay & Silent Bob Reboot
item.description: Kevin Smith wasn't kidding when he said he included more than one Batman actor in Jay & Silent Bob Reboot.

item.title: Mark Ruffalo Exposes Marvel Co-Stars Napping to Kick Off Comic-Con
item.description: Thor: Ragnarok brought together an extraordinary crew together and Mark Ruffalo is reminding Comic-Con of that.

item.title: Dark Fate Comic-Con Poster Rips the Skin Off New Terminator Endoskeleton
item.description: Paramount Pictures has released a new Terminator: Dark Fate poster ahead of the latest trailer reveal.

item.title: Jay and Silent Bob Reboot Poster & Sneak Peek Screenings Announced
item.description: The red band Jay and Silent Bob trailer hit earlier this morning, now we have word on the special sneak peeks coming this October.

item.title: Jay & Silent Bob Reboot Red Band Trailer: The Boys Return to Destroy Hollywood
item.description: The first trailer for director Kevin Smith's Jay and Silent Bob Reboot has arrived following its debut at San Diego Comic-Con.

item.title: IT Chapter Two Comic-Con Trailer Is Here, Pennywise Is Out for Bloody Revenge
item.description: Andres Muschietti kicked of San Diego-Comic-Con the right way by introducing some brand-new footage from IT Chapter Two.

item.title: Supergirl Star Melissa Benoist Is Chronic in Jay and Silent Bob Reboot
item.description: Kevin Smith has confirmed Melissa Benoist as the new Chronic with a new image of her on the set.

item.title: WWE Superstars Become Ghostbusters Complete with Undertaker Ghost in New Mattel Toys
item.description: Straight out of San Diego Comic-Con comes the reveal of Ghostbusters and WWE crossover figures.

item.title: IT Chapter Two Footage Description from ScareDiego, Cast Terrorizes SDCC 2019
item.description: Andres Muschietti and the IT Chapter Two cast unveiled a few scenes from the upcoming sequel at the ScareDiego event at San Diego Comic-Con.

item.title: Rise of Skywalker Sith Trooper Unveiled at Comic-Con
item.description: The new Sith Trooper from Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker was shown off at Comic-Con, with the armor being unveiled on the showroom floor of #SDCC.

item.title: NECA Announces Life-Size Chucky & Tiffany Dolls from Bride of Chucky
item.description: NECA unveils big Bride of Chucky life-size replica plans just before San Diego Comic-Con 2019.

item.title: IT Chapter Two Poster Teases the End of Pennywise
item.description: Comic-Con is about to get dominated by Pennywise the Dancing Clown as the latest trailer for IT Chapter Two releases tomorrow morning.

item.title: Marvel Comic-Con 2019 Booth & Signing Schedules: Everything You Need to Know
item.description: Check out a jam-packed Marvel Booth schedule featuring Marvel's livestream events, giveaways, exclusive previews, contests, and more!

item.title: Jay & Silent Bob Reboot Poster Gives Bluntman & Chronic a Gritty Gender Twist
item.description: Kevin Smith has revealed a poster for Jay and Silent Bob Reboot, which features a female version of the hero Chronic.

item.title: Mondo Is Bringing Who Framed Roger Rabbit, Blade Runner 2049 Vinyl Exclusives to Comic-Con
item.description: Mondo is brining two iconic exclusive scores to San Diego Comic-Con 2019 with vinyl releases of Who Framed Roger Rabbit and Blade Runner 2049 soundtracks.

item.title: Child's Play Good Guys Cereal Is Finally Real and You Can Eat Some Right Now
item.description: Andy's Good Guys cereal in the original Child's Play is now a real product that you can buy and eat.

item.title: Dragon Ball Will Attempt to Set Guinness World Record at Comic-Con
item.description: San Diego Comic-Con to feature Dragon Ball 2019 World Adventure in an attempt to make history on the opening day of the tour.

item.title: Avengers: Endgame Directors Share Mysterious Comic-Con Teaser, Is the Community Movie Coming?
item.description: San Diego Comic-Con is next week and the Russo Brothers are hosting a panel next Friday.

item.title: Sith Trooper Revealed in Rise of Skywalker Comic-Con Exclusives
item.description: Lucasfilm will also have the red Sith Troopers from The Rise of Skywalker on full display at San Diego Comic-Con.

item.title: Marvel's Game-Changing MCU Panel Teased: What Can We Expect at Comic-Con?
item.description: Marvel Studios and the Russo Brothers are heading to San Diego Comic-Con and everybody is wondering what they're going to discuss.

item.title: John Hammond Is Getting His Own Jurassic Park Action Figure at Comic-Con
item.description: Mattel has revealed their Jurassic World Legacy Collection John Hammond action figure as a San Diego Comic-Con exclusive.

item.title: Mondo Unleashes MONDOIDS Which Include Jason Voorhees, Gremlins, Jurassic Park & More
item.description: Get your gross out on with Mondo's new madballs-style MONDOIDS series 1 launching at this year's Comic-Con.

item.title: Marvel Studios Confirmed to Unveil Future of MCU in Hall H at Comic-Con 2019
item.description: Kevin Feige and crew are making it official at San Diego Comic-Con with a huge Hall H presentation.

item.title: Jay & Silent Bob Reboot Red Band Trailer Will Drop at Comic-Con
item.description: Kevin Smith reveals the first red-band trailer for Jay & Silent Bob Reboot is coming with him to Hall H at SDCC this year.

item.title: Sony Pictures Joins Universal and Warner Bros. in Skipping Comic-Con
item.description: Sony joins Universal and Warner Bros. in skipping out on presenting at San Diego Comic-Con 2019.

item.title: Jay & Silent Bob Reboot Is Coming to Comic-Con
item.description: Jay & Silent Bob Reboot is going to have a big presence at San Diego Comic-Con this year.

item.title: Marvel Studios Will Return to Hall H at Comic-Con, So What Are They Bringing?
item.description: After skipping out in 2018, Marvel Studios will be coming back to Hall H at San Diego Comic-Con, which makes this a big event for fans.

item.title: IT Chapter Two Is Heading to Comic-Con While Rest of Warner Bros. Stays Home
item.description: Pennywise the Dancing Clown is going to be down in San Diego this summer welcoming guests to Comic-Con and promoting IT Chapter 2.

item.title: NECA Brings T2: Judgment Day John Connor Figure with Dirt Bike to Comic-Con
item.description: The Ultimate John Connor figure based on Edward Furlong comes from NECA and will be sold exclusively this year at San Diego Comic Con.

item.title: Mythical Justice League Snyder Cut Unites DC Fans for Suicide Prevention
item.description: Hardcore Zack Snyder fans set up a successful GoFundMe campaign in an effort to get the original cut of Justice League out while raising awareness for a good cause.
